text: Ernst Budig (1 January 1908 - 29 December 1971) was a German swimmer. He competed in the men's 200 metre breaststroke event at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1971 deaths Category:German male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Germany Category:Swimmers at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Cologne
title: Ernst Budig
